messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Why are the elements from above no longer in sync-buttons?

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> Why are the elements from above no longer in sync-buttons?

They float around the image while sync-buttons are below it (clear: both).

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Just add float:left to the #account-picture-wrapper block; ltr is default.

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Do you really need to set z-index here?

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: -webkit-margin-start and move it into #sync-general, get rid of these.

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> No px for 0.

Done.

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> Just add float:left to the #account-picture-wrapper block; ltr is default.

Done.

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> Use opacity?

That would make both the background and the text transparent, right?

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> No px for 0.

Done.

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> Do you really need to set z-index here?

Not really.

messages.author: Ivan Korotkov
messages.text:
On 2012/02/18 19:27:04, James Hawkins wrote:
> -webkit-margin-start and move it into #sync-general, get rid of these.

Done.
